Key Match Events: Ja Morant recorded a double-double with 16 points and 10 assists.
The Grizzlies managed a 26-point lead in the second quarter through unselfish play and five assists from Morant.
Pre-Game Insights: The game marked the return of Jaren Jackson Jr. to the lineup.
Post-Match Reflections: The Grizzlies secured a 124-111 victory, improving to 2-1 in the 2024-25 season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was significant as it was the official return of Jaren Jackson Jr.
The Grizzlies were highlighted as they managed to defend their homecourt despite the Magic's offensive efforts.
